org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.bpr
Class AeTempFileUploadHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.bpr.AeTempFileUploadHandler
public class AeTempFileUploadHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Default implementation of IAeFileUploadHandler. Uses the given InputStream to create a temp file for bpr deployment. Delegates to IAeEngineAdministration to handle the actual deployment details. Them removes the temp file (after success or failure).
